Inchallah kheir.

-Uh…
 Nicole…

Please, sir, sit down.
 No need to get upset like that.

The idea was to buy Wonder

Si vous me proposez une délocalisation en Chine,

has surprised everyone by taking on the troubled battery giant

Wonder is in debt.
 How much?

Oh, fuck.
 Minimum.

-But you can't do that. -I know, Dad.
 I said that from the beginning.

Sao vậy được!
 Con biết. Con đã nói vậy từ đầu.

♪ Je veux être une star ♪

Alors, écoutez.
